name: Space Shooter (itch) (Kale Abelgas)
description:
Space Shooter

Fight against hordes of brainless UFOs! You can choose to attack using your points, or to dodge and weave the enemy.

Tip: Get Points from killing enemies. Points and Health regenerate over time. 
If the browser version doesn't play for you, download the exe version. 

Music is from Jan125 - show them support! https://opengameart.org/content/stereotypical-90s-space-shooter-music

Controls:  W, A, S, D - MOVE PRESS / HOLD SPACE - ATTACK

If you liked the game, please let me know in the comments as well as a rating. Feedback is appreciated!

You can support me by downloading the game below. Thank you! More updates will be added to windows version soon <3
